title: No, Hurricanes Helene and Milton Were Not “Supercharged” by Climate Change
description: We may live in the 21st century, but when it comes to the weather, the human mind has not evolved past Dark Age superstition.
content:
From Chris Martz Weather
by Chris Martz
We may live in the 21st century, but when it comes to the weather, the human mind has not evolved past Dark Age superstition.
No matter what the weather is … [+37958 chars]
de: Nein, die Hurrikane Helene und Milton wurden durch den Klimawandel nicht „aufgeladen“. Wir leben vielleicht im 21. Jahrhundert, aber wenn es um das Wetter geht, hat sich der menschliche Geist nicht über den Aberglauben des dunklen Zeitalters hinaus entwickelt.
en: No, Hurricanes Helene and Milton Were Not “Supercharged” by Climate Change. We may live in the 21st century, but when it comes to the weather, the human mind has not evolved past Dark Age superstition.
la: Imo turbinum Helene et Milton non erant "supercharge" a Clima Muta. Vivere possumus saeculo XXI, sed cum tempestas venit, mens humana superstitionem saeculi obscuritatis non evolvit.
